findings.details: Standardized news thumbnails with consistent sizing and class-based styling to reduce layout shifts.
Links were identified but not validated due to restricted network access. No placeholder domains found in recent posts.
Key pages and posts include description/keywords; language tags align with pt-BR.
Removed stray credit lines and normalized inline thumbnail markup for clearer summaries.

recommendations: Run automated link validation when network access is available
Keep daily news generator aligned with thumbnail markup to reduce CLS
